UNSW DataSoc Datathon 2019: Final round



Date:
4th - 5th September 2019

Facebook Event Link

For more information email: hello@unswdata.com

Following the roaring success of DataSoc‚Äôs domestic Datathon round, the stage is set for the grand FINALE where the AUSSIE WINNERS and the best from TSINGHUA University will compete for the ultimate glory!

Teams will once again battle it out with another challenging dataset that will require them to use all their analytical, collaboration, teamwork and presentation abilities in solving the problems given to them. Under an intense 24 hour framework, these skills will be put to the maximum test!

Having been through the trials and tribulations of the first round, these winners know they must devote their time wisely and that they will need to take it up another notch! And if they need any motivation, just remember the AWESOME PRIZES on offer!

For those of you who have an interest in data science or want to support your friends, this is a great arena to see how real problems are being handled in a complex, competitive manner. So come on down to learn and watch from our teams!

The event will take place during the Trimester Holidays üòç on Wednesday 4th of September, over 24 hours before finishing with a presentation to industry partners from here and China.
